posts.message: Does it make any engineering sense to use ReactJS in conjunction with AngularJS? or is it just geeky? I am ok with geeky, I just want to know if anyone tried it before in some real project and if there were any lessons learned?

I've been reading more and more news about hacking based on social engineering ... I read once about a guy who said that he used to practice in front of a mirror how he talks to others and trained himself to be more convincing. He was able to infiltrate popular companies like MediaTemple, ComCast and Verizon.

posts.description: Failure is part of engineering any large-scale system. One of Facebook�s cultural values is embracing failure. This can be seen in the posters hung around the walls of our Menlo Park headquarters: "What Would You Do If You Weren�t Afraid?" and "Fortune Favors the Bold."
